slide.title: Querying: $gte
slide.blurb: Find circuses with 40 or more performers.

div.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo;
$c = $m->demo->circus;

$r = $c->findOne(
  // query
  array( 'performers' => array( '$gte' => 40 ) ),
  // projection
  array( 'name' => true, 'performers' => true )
);
var_dump( $r );
?>
